api_list.api_description: Retrieve metadata for an Archive.org item

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The identifier for the Archive.org item.

api_list.api_description: Checks if a given URL is archived and currently accessible in the Wayback Machine

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL to check for availability in the Wayback Machine.

optional_parameters.name: timestamp
optional_parameters.description: Timestamp to look up in Wayback in YYYYMMDDhhmmss format.

query: Can you retrieve the metadata for the item 'popeye_taxi-turvey' on Archive.org and also check if the URL 'example.com' was archived on the Wayback Machine at the beginning of 2020?
